channel.title: [PI] Object timer to spawn an object

item.title: [PI] Object timer to spawn an object
item.dc:creator: @Darkmist Darkmist
item.description:
@Darkmist wrote:

Hey everyone Im working on a nice little feature for my server which requires and object to spawn on a timer, iv come up with this code to do it but im not sure what file to add it into?

if (c.ObjectTimer = 120) { c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2403, 2873, 10201, 1, 10); } c.sendMessage("my message!!"); break;

I added it to objectmanager, Client.java, and clickobject.java and i get an error saying

Cannot find symbol

c.ObjectTimer
^

If you can solve my problem i would highly appreciate it

thanks

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Object timer to spawn an object
